title: East Village TRUE 2br's AVAILABLE FOR IMMEDIATE MOVE IN
posting_body: ['Hi everyone, these apartments are for immediate move-in, meaning this week up to possibly Aug 10.', 'They are NOT available for Sept 1.', 'Serious, qualified inquiries only please.', 'Minimum one year lease.', '12% Broker Fee on each.', 'Prices are firm.', '-12th', 'St Ave A, laundry in unit $4250', '-14th St Ave A, laundrymat right on the block, $3650 - $3850', '-11th', 'St bet Ave B & Ave C, laundry in unit $3900', '-14th', 'St 2nd Ave $3950, charmer', '-2nd Street & Ave C, laundry in building, large private garden, $4300', '-8th', 'St off Ave C, huge 2br w/ balcony, laundry, elevator, gym, shared yard $4900', '-Bowery & Rivington, 18 foot ceilings, huge loft bonus space, dishwasher, $5000', 'Endlessly convenient East Village locations steps from Target, Trader Joe’s, Westville, Empellon, Raclette, Au Zaatar, Yucca, Berlin, Miss Lily’s, Maiden Lane, Niagara and countless more.', 'Tons of great food and drink options throughout the entire neighborhood as well aa beautiful Tompkins Square Park.', 'This is a residential NYC neighborhood with tons of supermarkets, drycleaners, hardware stores, take-out spots, 24 hr bodegas, etc.', 'Easy walking distance to the Lower East Side, Union Square, Soho, Nolita, Little Italy, etc.', 'Easy walking distance to the Lower East Side, Union Square, Soho, Nolita, Little Italy, etc.', 'The L train on 14th Street and Avenue A, the F train on 1st and 1st or 2nd and 1st, the F/J/M/Z on Delancey and the 6 train on Astor Place, the M14A / 14D bus which runs crosstown across 14th street, the M21 which runs crosstown along Houston, the M8 bus which runs crosstown along 8th / 9th st and the 9 which runs down Avve C from Kips Bay to Workd Trade are the translortation options, along with numerous Citibike stations.', 'Small, friendly east village landlords require 1 month rent and 1 month security and out of town guarantors are accepted as needed.', 'We are a long-time local realtor specializing in the areas we know and love best, happy to assist our clients through these difficult markets.', 'The landlord requires that we ask prospective tenants a few questions before showing the unit, text 516.262.3693 for immediate response, otherwise if you need to email please add a US contact number.', 'Thank you!', 'Cheers,', 'Nick and Pam', '516.262.3693', 'WE HAVE MULTIPLE LISTINGS FOR 1, 2, 3, AND 4 BEDROOMS THROUGHOUT THE EAST VILLAGE, WEST VILLAGE, LES, UNION SQUARE AREA, GRAMERCY, SOHO AND KIPS BAY AREA.', 'CALL US TODAY AND WE’LL BE HAPPY TO ASSIST IN YOUR SEARCH.', 'ALSO CHECK OUT NICK’S BLOG FOR THE BEST OF EATING AND DRINKING IN THE EAST VILLAGE:', '<URL>/']
